Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.intent

Class DynamicIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.intent.DynamicIntent
  • public class DynamicIntent
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to manage the intent and extras.

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeIntent

        @NonNull
public static Intent getThemeIntent​(@NonNull
                                    Context context,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    @NonNull
                                    java.lang.String action,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.String theme,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.String defaultTheme,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.String text)
        Returns an intent to edit or show the dynamic theme.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to create the intent.
        clazz - The theme activity class to create the intent.
        action - The action for the intent.
        theme - The dynamic app theme extra for the intent.
        defaultTheme - The optional dynamic app theme default extra for the intent.
        text - The optional text extra for the intent.
        Returns:
        The intent to edit or show the dynamic theme.
        See Also:
        Intent.setComponent(ComponentName), Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP, EXTRA_THEME, EXTRA_THEME_DEFAULT, EXTRA_TEXT

      • getThemeIntent

public static Intent getThemeIntent​(@NonNull
                                    Context context,
                                    @NonNull
                                    java.lang.String action,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.String theme)
        Returns an intent to edit or show the dynamic theme.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to create the intent.
        action - The action for the intent.
        theme - The dynamic app theme extra for the intent.
        Returns:
        The intent to edit or show the dynamic theme.
        See Also:
        getThemeIntent(Context, Class, String, String, String, String)

      • getThemeShareIntent

        @NonNull
public static Intent getThemeShareIntent​(@NonNull
                                         Context context,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.String action,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String theme,
                                         int themeType,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String themeUrl,
                                         @Nullable
                                         Uri bitmapUri,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String text)
        Returns an intent to share the dynamic theme with a bitmap (code) URI.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to create the intent.
        clazz - The theme activity class to create the intent.
        action - The action for the intent.
        theme - The dynamic app theme extra for the intent.
        themeType - The app theme type extra for the intent.
        themeUrl - The optional dynamic app theme URL extra for the intent.
        bitmapUri - The optional bitmap URI extra for the intent.
        text - The optional text extra for the intent.
        Returns:
        The intent to share the dynamic theme with a bitmap (code) URI.
        See Also:
        Intent.setComponent(ComponentName), Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP, EXTRA_THEME, EXTRA_THEME_URL, EXTRA_THEME_BITMAP_URI, EXTRA_PREVIEW

      • getThemeShareIntent

        @NonNull
public static Intent getThemeShareIntent​(@NonNull
                                         Context context,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.String action,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String theme,
                                         int themeType,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String themeUrl,
                                         @Nullable
                                         Uri bitmapUri)
        Returns an intent to share the dynamic theme with a bitmap (code) URI.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to create the intent.
        clazz - The theme activity class to create the intent.
        action - The action for the intent.
        theme - The dynamic app theme extra for the intent.
        themeType - The app theme type extra for the intent.
        themeUrl - The optional dynamic app theme URL extra for the intent.
        bitmapUri - The optional bitmap URI extra for the intent.
        Returns:
        The intent to share the dynamic theme with a bitmap (code) URI.
        See Also:

      • editTheme

        public static boolean editTheme​(@Nullable
                                Context context,
                                @Nullable
                                androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner,
                                @Nullable
                                java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String action,
                                int requestCode,
                                @Nullable
                                java.lang.String theme,
                                @Nullable
                                java.lang.String defaultTheme,
                                @Nullable
                                java.lang.String text,
                                @Nullable
                                View sharedElement)
        Try to launch an intent to edit or show the dynamic theme.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to create the intent.
        owner - The requesting owner for the intent.
        clazz - The theme activity class to create the intent.
        action - The action for the intent.
        requestCode - The request code for the intent.
        theme - The dynamic app theme extra for the intent.
        defaultTheme - The optional dynamic app theme default extra for the intent.
        text - The optional text extra for the intent.
        sharedElement - The optional view for the shared element transition.
        Returns:
        true on successful operation.
        See Also:
        getThemeIntent(Context, Class, String, String, String, String), Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int, Bundle), Fragment.startActivityForResult(Intent, int, Bundle), Context.startActivity(Intent)
